newsitem.title: FRANCE: Cap Gemini to take full Bossard control.
newsitem.headline: Cap Gemini to take full Bossard control.

text.p: French computer services group Cap Gemini said on Monday that it planned to take full control of management consultancy company Groupe Bossard.
It already owns 49 percent and said in a statement it had the agreement of the vast majority of the partners in Groupe Bossard who hold the other 51 percent.
The deal should be carried out on January 1 and reinforce Cap Gemini's position in international management consultancy, it said. Bossard has 800 consultancies of which 450 are in France, it added.
